trans-unit.source: Derivative of <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.ActivityValidator"></xref> that is the base class for all composite activity validator components.
trans-unit.target: Derivativo di <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.ActivityValidator"> </xref> che è la classe base per tutti i componenti di convalida di attività composita.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] The class provides validation logic for a <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CompositeActivity>.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]La classe fornisce la logica di convalida per un <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CompositeActivity>.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CompositeActivity>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.CompositeActivityValidator"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza di <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.CompositeActivityValidator"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: This method calls Validate on every child <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity> in the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CompositeActivity.EnabledActivities%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: Questo metodo chiama convalida su ogni elemento figlio <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity>nel <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CompositeActivity.EnabledActivities%2A>insieme.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CompositeActivity.EnabledActivities%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity>

trans-unit.source: It also checks that no more than one <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CancellationHandlerActivity>, <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.FaultHandlersActivity>, or <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CompensationHandlerActivity> is attached to the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CompositeActivity>.
trans-unit.target: Controlla inoltre che non più di una <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CancellationHandlerActivity>, <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.FaultHandlersActivity>, oppure <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CompensationHandlerActivity>è connesso a <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CompositeActivity>.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CompositeActivity> </xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CompensationHandlerActivity> </xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.FaultHandlersActivity> </xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CancellationHandlerActivity>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.ValidationErrorCollection"></xref> of errors found during validation.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.ValidationErrorCollection"> </xref> di errori rilevati durante la convalida.

trans-unit.source: obj is a null reference ( in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: objè un riferimento null ( in Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: Validates the change based on the affected <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"></xref> and provides the error.
trans-unit.target: Convalida la modifica in base agli <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"> </xref> e fornisce l'errore.

trans-unit.source: If validation occurs without error, a null reference (`Nothing`) is returned.
trans-unit.target: Se la convalida viene eseguita senza errori, un riferimento null (`Nothing`) viene restituito.

trans-unit.source: action is a null reference ().
trans-unit.target: actionè un riferimento null ().
